title: Blue Hour Static
tags: Dream Pop, Lo-fi, K-R&B, Neo-Soul, Ambient Pop, Chillwave
prompt:
[Verse 1]
Three-fifteen on a muted screen
Just the hum of the machine
And the vinyl crackle in the space
Where the pillow holds an empty place
A soft indent, a faded line
A ghost of peace I thought was mine

[Chorus]
But oh, the silence makes it loud
Every whisper in the crowd is me
Floating in the blue hour static
Where the truth feels automatic
And every thought is crystal clear
I hear it all when no one's here

[Verse 2]
Thereâ€™s a silver wire, a pale blue thread
Cuts across the unmade bed
From the blinds, a single ray
Washing all the grey away
It lands upon the bedroom floor
Shows me what I came here for

[Chorus]
And oh, the silence makes it loud
Every whisper in the crowd is me
Floating in the blue hour static
Where the truth feels automatic
And every thought is crystal clear
I hear it all when no one's here

[Bridge]
In the pause between the dark and dawn
Every mask I wear is gone
There's no one left to lie to now
Just the ceiling and a silent vow
To remember what this quiet taught
The honest shape of every thought

[Chorus]
And oh, the silence makes it loud
Every whisper in the crowd is me
Floating in the blue hour static
Where the truth feels automatic
And every thought is crystal clear
I hear it all when no one's here

[Outro]
The blue remains...
The static fades...
Just a breath... fades...
